languages.text: {n}Из вокса Вигдис доносится едва слышный смешок.{/n} "Вам ли не знать, Лорд-капитан? Мы оба родились и выросли в холодной темноте космоса. Однако не бывает двух одинаковых историй, как не бывает двух идентичных звезд. Если пожелаете, я с удовольствием поведаю вам о жизни пустотнорожденных этого корабля".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из вокс-синтезатора Вигдис доносится едва слышный смешок.{/n} "Вам ли не знать, Лорд-капитан? Мы оба родились и выросли в холодной темноте космоса. Однако не бывает двух одинаковых историй, как не бывает двух идентичных звезд. Если пожелаете, я с удовольствием поведаю вам о жизни пустотников этого корабля".

languages.text: {n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."
languages.original_text: {n}Из вокса Вигдис доносится едва слышный смешок.{/n} "Вам ли не знать, Лорд-капитан? Мы оба родились и выросли в холодной темноте космоса. Однако не бывает двух одинаковых историй, как не бывает двух идентичных звезд. Если пожелаете, я с удовольствием поведаю вам о жизни пустотнорожденных этого корабля".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis' vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know it, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will happily tell you about the lives of Voidborn aboard this vessel."

{n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will happily tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

{n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will happily tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

{n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

languages.text: {n}El voco de Vigdis chisporrotea con una risa casi inaudible.{/n} «¿No lo sabe, Lord Capitán? Amb{mf|o|a}s nacimos en la fría inmensidad del espacio, pero, al igual que no hay dos estrellas iguales, tampoco hay dos historias idénticas. Si quiere, le hablaré con mucho gusto de las vidas de los nacidos en el vacío de esta nave».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Vigdis chisporrotea con una risa casi inaudible.{/n} «¿No lo sabe, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}? Amb{mf|o|a}s nacimos en la fría inmensidad del espacio, pero, al igual que no hay dos estrellas iguales, tampoco hay dos historias idénticas. Si quiere, le hablaré de las vidas de los nacidos en el vacío de esta nave».

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯的音阵系统发出了几乎听不到的笑声。{/n}“您不知道吗，舰长大人？我们两个都是在寒冷、辽阔的太空中出生的。但天空中并没有两颗相同的星星，我们两个人的经历也截然不同。如果您感兴趣的话，我很乐意告诉您这艘飞船上的虚空之子都过着怎样的生活。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯的音阵系统发出了几乎听不到的笑声。{/n}“您不知道吗，舰长大人？我们两个都是在寒冷、辽阔的太空中出生的。但天空中并没有两颗相同的星星，我们两个人的经历也截然不同。如果您感兴趣的话，我很乐意告诉您这艘飞船上的虚空之子都过着怎样的生活。”

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスのヴォクスは、ほとんど聞きとれないような笑い声をあげる。{/n}「ご存じありませんか、ロード・キャプテン？私達はふたり共、冷たく広い宇宙で生まれたのです。しかし同じ星がふたつとないように、同じ物語もありません。よろしければ、この船で生きる虚空生まれの生活を喜んでお話ししましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスのヴォクスは、ほとんど聞きとれないような笑い声をあげる。{/n}「ご存じありませんか、ロード・キャプテン？私達はふたり共、冷たく広い宇宙で生まれたのです。しかし同じ星がふたつとないように、同じ物語もありません。よろしければ、この船で生きる虚空生まれの生活を喜んでお話ししましょう」

languages.text: {n}Das Knistern aus Vigdis' Vox könnte ein kaum hörbares Lachen sein.{/n} "Wisst Ihr das nicht, Lord Captain? Wir wurden doch beide in der kalten Weite des Weltraums geboren. Aber es gibt keine zwei identischen Geschichten, genau wie es keine zwei identischen Sterne gibt. Wenn Ihr wollt, erzähle ich Euch gerne etwas über das Leben der Kinder der Leere an Bord dieses Schiffs."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Knistern aus Vigdis' Vox könnte ein kaum hörbares Lachen sein.{/n} "Wisst Ihr das nicht, Lord Captain? Wir wurden doch beide in der kalten Weite des Weltraums geboren. Aber es gibt keine zwei identischen Geschichten, genau wie es keine zwei identischen Sterne gibt. Wenn Ihr wollt, erzähle ich Euch gerne etwas über das Leben der Kinder der Leere an Bord dieses Schiffs."

languages.text: {n}Un rire à peine audible fait crépiter le vox de Vigdis.{/n} « Vous devriez pourtant le savoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, puisque nous sommes {mf|tous|toutes} les deux {mf|nés|nées} dans le vide infini de l'espace. Mais il est vrai que nos histoires à tous sont aussi uniques et nombreuses que les étoiles. Si vous le souhaitez, je me ferai un plaisir de vous décrire la vie des hors-monde à bord de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rire à peine audible fait crépiter le vox de Vigdis.{/n} « Vous devriez pourtant le savoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, puisque nous sommes {mf|tous|toutes} les deux {mf|nés|nées} dans le vide infini de l'espace. Mais il est vrai que nos histoires à tous sont aussi uniques et nombreuses que les étoiles. Si vous le souhaitez, je me ferai un plaisir de vous décrire la vie des hors-monde à bord de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis'in voksundan güç bela duyulabilir bir kahkaha yükseliyor.{/n} "Bilmiyor musunuz Lord Kaptan? İkimiz de uzayın soğuk enginliğinde doğduk ama nasıl birbirinin tıpatıp aynısı iki yıldız olamazsa iki kişinin hikâyesi de birbirine benzemez. Dilerseniz gemideki uçsuzdoğanların yaşamından size memnuniyetle bahsedebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's vox crackles with barely audible laughter.{/n} "Don't you know, Lord Captain? Both of us were born in the cold vastness of space. But there are no two identical tales, just as there are no two identical stars. If you like, I will gladly tell you about the lives of the voidborn aboard this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis'in voksundan güç bela duyulabilir bir kahkaha yükseliyor.{/n} "Bilmiyor musunuz Lord Kaptan? İkimiz de uzayın soğuk enginliğinde doğduk ama nasıl birbirinin tıpatıp aynısı iki yıldız olamazsa iki kişinin hikâyesi de birbirine benzemez. Dilerseniz gemideki uçsuzdoğanların yaşamından size memnuniyetle bahsedebilirim."
